DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study measure metabolic behavioral effect 12-week yoga program couple health education ( HED ) compare HED alone . In randomized clinical trial 90 patient ( 45 patient per arm ) , investigator measure effect two intervention IR , HTN , dysplidemia , body composition ( See Figure 1 . Study Diagram ) . Subjects schedule outcome assessment baseline , 12 week , 24 week . In addition , investigator collect data baseline 12 week self-efficacy , stress , mindfulness , mood . As sub-study randomized control trial , investigator measure aerobic intensity yoga estimate dose physical exercise provide yoga ( n=10 ) . Subjects willing eligible participate RCT receive write consent . Consented subject randomize either 12 week yoga HED versus HED alone . Subjects randomize yoga receive 30 45 minute weekly yoga instruction , follow 30 45 minute HED . Subjects receive write instruction home yoga practice lifestyle change base HED . Subjects randomize HED alone receive weekly standardize HED curriculum attention time match yoga HED arm .
